_comment: These test cases are currently failing because the relevant documentation is not in the vector database (chappie-ingestion-quarkus:3.30.6). Add them back to rag-eval.json when the documentation coverage improves.
_reason: Missing or insufficient documentation in vector database

query: What is Quarkus Dev Mode and how does it work?
_note: Query returns maven-tooling.adoc and gradle-tooling.adoc instead of dev-mode specific docs

query: How do I create a GraphQL endpoint in Quarkus?
_note: No graphql documentation found in top results

query: How do I connect to MongoDB in Quarkus?
_note: Query returns generic getting-started docs instead of mongodb-specific content. Note: mongodb-panache.adoc exists and works for panache queries, but generic MongoDB connection docs may be missing

query: How do I add fault tolerance with @Retry in Quarkus?
_note: Returns kafka.adoc and unrelated extension docs instead of fault-tolerance content

query: How do I configure CORS in Quarkus?
_note: Returns cli-tooling.adoc and gradle-tooling.adoc instead of CORS/HTTP configuration docs

query: How do I validate request parameters using Bean Validation in Quarkus?
_note: Returns config-mappings.adoc instead of validation-specific documentation

query: How do I use Qute templating engine in Quarkus?
_note: Returns scripting.adoc and scheduler.adoc instead of qute documentation. Note: qute-reference.adoc exists (seen in fault-tolerance query) but not retrieved for qute queries

query: How do I create a REST client using @RegisterRestClient?
_note: Returns security-openid-connect-client docs instead of REST client docs. Note: rest-client.adoc exists and works well for other queries, may need query refinement

query: How do I run code on application startup in Quarkus?
_note: Returns tooling docs instead of lifecycle documentation. Note: lifecycle.adoc was seen in command-mode query results

query: How do I create reactive routes in Quarkus?
_note: Returns extension-metadata.adoc and tooling docs instead of reactive routes documentation
